      • admin

        private boolean admin

    • Constructor Detail

      • Teacher

        public Teacher(java.lang.String mailN,
               java.lang.String passN,
               java.lang.String nameN)
        throws ConnException
        Copying class constructor. Admin defaultly set to false.
        Parameters:
        mailN - value checked by Model.isHacker(String) method, copied to private field Person.mail.
        passN - value checked by Model.isHacker(String) method, copied to private field Person.pass.
        nameN - value checked by Model.isHacker(String) method, copied to private field Person.name.
        Throws:
        ConnException - thrown when there is hacking possibility (see method Model.isHacker(String)).

      • Teacher

        public Teacher(java.sql.ResultSet result,
               BuildingType buildingType)
        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Main constructor of the class, taking information from
        Parameters:
        result - ResultSet value, keeping result of SQL query with teacher information.
        buildingType - BuildingType enum value, indicating way of constructing: either with going to next rows of ResultSet, or omitting it.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown because of sudden error in connection with SQL database or error in information.
